images.place: Dim Sum Cafe, Las Vegas, Nevada

description:
Deep-fried whole smelt.

**Characters**

[炸](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/%E7%82%B8) is *deep-fried*, and [多春魚](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/%E5%A4%9A%E6%98%A5%E9%AD%9A) is *smelt*.

words.English: fish fillet with black bean sauce

images.place: China a Go Go, Las Vegas, Nevada

description:
Pieces of fish [stir-fried](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stir_frying) with black bean sauce and vegetables such as bell peppers.

**Characters**

[豉汁](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/%E8%B1%89%E6%B1%81) is *black bean sauce*, ([豉](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/%E8%B1%89) is *salted fermented black bean* and [汁](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/%E6%B1%81) is *sauce*), and 斑球 is *spotted ball*.
